title: Thursday Afternoon Monday Morning Podcast 9-29-22
itunes:title: Thursday Afternoon Monday Morning Podcast 9-29-22
description:
Bill rambles with comedian Jim Florentine about prank phone calls, social media, and going to concerts.

His new special 'Bite the Bullet'  is available on Amazon Prime and his new prank album 'Terrorizing Telemarketers Vol. 7' wherever you listen to music.

Thursday Afternoon Podcast: (00:00 - 40:15)

Throwback Episode: (40:20 - 1:38:38)

Bill rambles about abandoning your life, NFL predictions and Derek Jeter's last game at Fenway.

Anything Better NFL Preview & Picks WEEK 4: (1:38:50 - end)

Thursday Afternoon Interlude: Van Halen -  Unchained

SoloStove:  Go to www.SoloStove.com for $10 off your order. Use the promo code BURR
